column1: .jfk-bubble.gtx-bubble, .captcheck_answer_label > input + img, span#closed_text > img[src^=""https://www.gstatic.com/images/branding/googlelogo""], span[data-href^=""https://www.hcaptcha.com/""] > #icon, ::-webkit-calendar-picker-indicator, img.Wirisformula, div[role=""dialog""] div[role=""document""], div[role=""dialog""] div[role=""document""] {
For 1000 endpoints we recommend 8 CPU 12RAM and 1TB HHD space.
You can download the VM image from the link below.
During the VM import you set the necessary resources.
Then we schedule a remote connection to adjust the HDD space the server is using.
You can also check the manual below.
This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.
For 1000 endpoints we recommend the server resources of 8CPU, 12RAM and 1TB of HDD space.
Will the server have internet access?
If yes we can add the HDD space and optimize the server after importing the VM.
You can also check the user manual below.
This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.
